document_data.name: Hommet Shaw
document_data.languages: [[Common]], [[Dwarvish]], [[Elven language|Elvish]], [[Infernal language|Infernal]]{{Cite dragon+/2/Exploring Sword Coast Legends/Character Sheets}}
document_data.Personality: Hommet was a young, talented, and eager necromancer, but he was not a very detail-oriented person. Despite the reputation of most necromancers, he sought a mentor who wasn't evil or insane.
document_data.History:
Hommet was from the eccentric Harpell family.

He was born to a young pair of farmers in a small village near Longsaddle. He was a scrawny child, and no use around the farm. As such, his parents sent him off to live with his Uncle [[Kipper Harpell]]. He managed to get exiled for some reason.

At some point before [[1487 DR]], he travelled to [[Luskan]], where he at various times got mugged, kidnapped and blackmailed.

He trained under the mage [[Maferil]], but was sento to [[Neverwinter]] sometime before the wizard's death around [[1487 DR]]. He returned to Luskan after hearing of Maferil's murder.[[En:n-Space|n-Space]] (October 2015). Designed by Dan Tudge, et al. ''[[Sword Coast Legends]]''. [[En:Digital Extremes|Digital Extremes]]. He wanted to join an adventuring party in order to prove himself but also make some allies in the process. During the journey to Luskan, his caravan was ambushed, and, to save his own life, he played dead and was dragged to the bandits' hideout, where he later encountered the [[Champion of the Burning Dawn]].
